attributes.action: show hostillity to chinese officials and encourage the end of discrimination against falun gong practisioners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People in China, who practise this particular religion are being arrested, forced into labour camps, tortured and forced to renounce their religion.  they are barely given enough to eat and drink and when dettained police officials do not even show proof of identity or a warrant.  some forms of torture include brutal beeting and being left in temperatures of over 40 degrees celcius, made to sit still for over 20hours a day. this is dispicable and we need to do something to help!
